key.name: initiate-rotation-button
key.description: Mouse button to start free rotation.

key.name: initiate-scale-button
key.description: Mouse button to start free scaling.

key.name: reset-button
key.description: Mouse button to reset the transformation.

key.name: reset-key
key.description: Keyboard shortcut to reset the transformation.

key.name: toggle-axis-key
key.description: Keyboard shortcut to toggle the visibility of the axis selection helper.

key.name: snap-mods
key.description: Use these bindings to enable/disable snapping.

key.name: invert-mods
key.description: Use these bindings to invert the rotation mode.

key.name: scale-up-button
key.description: Mouse button to scale the window up by one increment.

key.name: scale-down-button
key.description: Mouse button to scale the window down by one increment.

key.name: scale-up-key
key.description: Keyboard shortcut to scale the window up by one increment.

key.name: scale-down-key
key.description: Keyboard shortcut to scale the window down by one increment.

key.name: rotate-up-key
key.description: Keyboard shortcut to rotate the window up by one increment.

key.name: rotate-down-key
key.description: Keyboard shortcut to rotate the window down by one increment.

key.name: rotate-left-key
key.description: Keyboard shortcut to rotate the window left by one increment.

key.name: rotate-right-key
key.description: Keyboard shortcut to rotate the window right by one increment.

key.name: rotate-c-key
key.description: Keyboard shortcut to rotate the window clockwise by one increment.

key.name: rotate-cc-key
key.description: Keyboard shortcut to rotate the window counter-clockwise by one increment.

key.name: snap
key.description: Snap to common points by default.

key.name: snap-threshold
key.description: Snap to every one of these angles. (1 - 100)

key.name: mouse-sensitivity
key.description: Adjust how sensitive the mouse movement should be. (0.1 - 10.0)

key.name: scale-mode
key.description: Select the method to scale windows. (0 = To Centre, 1 = To Opposite Corner)

key.name: allow-negative
key.description: Allow negative scaling

key.name: scale-uniform
key.description: Keep the aspect ratio of the window constant when scaling.

key.name: min-scale
key.description: How small the scale is allowed to be when 'Allow Negative' is not activated. (0.01 - 1.0)

key.name: z-axis-rotation
key.description: Choose the type of the rotation. (0 = Always 2D, 1 = Always 3D, 2 = Determine On Click, 3 = Interchangeable, 4 = Switch, 5 = Trackball)

key.name: rotation-axis
key.description: How Freely Transformable Windows should determine the rotation axis. (0 = Always Centre, 1 = Click Point, 2 = Opposite to Click, 3 = Nearest Corner)

key.name: td-percent
key.description: The percentage of the window area used for 3D rotation. (10.0 - 90.0)

key.name: auto-zoom
key.description: Auto-Zoom when rotating so that windows do not get too large.

key.name: disable-on-transformed-screen
key.description: Disable the rotation on a transformed screen. This prevents ugly looking clipped windows when the screen is transformed.

key.name: speed
key.description: How fast the window should rotate. (0.1 - 15.0)

key.name: rotate-increment-amount
key.description: How far to rotate a window when rotating by an 'increment'. (1.0 - 100.0)

key.name: scale-increment-amount
key.description: How much to scale a window by when scaling by an 'increment'. (0.01 - 0.5)

key.name: shape-window-types
key.description: Window types that should be shaped. Disable problematic windows here. (match)

key.name: do-shape-input
key.description: Prevent input for transformed windows.

key.name: immediate-moves
key.description: Don't allow plugins like wobbly to manipulate the transformed window while it's being moved.

key.name: circle-color
key.description: Color and opacity of the circle.

key.name: line-color
key.description: Color and opacity of the helper line around the circle.

key.name: cross-line-color
key.description: Color and opacity of the cross lines.

key.name: show-circle
key.description: Show the click area for 3D rotation.

key.name: show-gizmo
key.description: Show the rotation axis info.

key.name: show-cross
key.description: Show the crosshair for scaling click regions.

key.name: show-region
key.description: Show the input region rectangle.
